Medical Function: Similar function to she xiang (musk); small amounts excite animal central nervous system; large amounts inhibit CNS in animals; strengthening effect on isolated animal hearts and causing blood pressure decrease
Chemical Ingredients: calcium, magnesium, phosphorus, copper, gallium, zinc, aluminum, manganese, strontium, niobium, chromium, lanthanum, nickel, titanium, tungsten
References: [1] 《Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草》
[2] 《Zhong Hua Ben Cao 中華本草》

, Complementary and Alternative Healing University

long 
    xian xiang 龍涎香   ( 
    in English and Chinese 中英文)


by: Joe Hing kwok Chu 
      
朱興國編
    譯    




Pharmaceutical name:
英文藥名﹕

 



Botanical name:
拉丁生物學名﹕


Source 
        of herb：

        Physeter catodon L.;

        Physeter macrocephalus L.



Pron. in Japanese:
日語發音﹕

ryusenko



Pron. in Korean:
韓語發音﹕

yong yeon hyang





        Pron. in Cantonese::
粵音﹕

lung4 jin4 heong1



Other Names:
別名﹕




long xie
龍泄


long xian
龍涎


long fu xiang
龍腹香


jing xian xiang
鯨涎香






Common Name:
英文名﹕

ambergris



Distribution:
產地﹕

all over the ocean.全球海洋。



Properties
characteristics﹕
性味﹕

sweet, fishy smell. 
        astringent.甘，氣腥，味涩。



Channels meridians entered:
 
歸經﹕

heart, liver, lung, kidney.心，肝，肺，腎。


Medical functions:
藥理﹕【1】
 



    Its function is similar to she xiang. A small amount can excite the central 
    nervous system; and large amount can inhibit CNS. and have the effect of 
    dropping blood pressure.
     龍涎香與麝香相似，小量對動物中樞神經系統有興奮作用，大量則表現抑制；對離體動物的心臟有強心作用，能引起血壓下降。



Actions & Indications:[2]
主治﹕【2】

化痰平喘；行氣散結；利水通淋。主喘咳氣逆；胸悶氣結；症瘕積聚；心腹疼痛；神昏；淋証。
Phlegm
and asthma; 
        promoting circulation and resolving tumors, promoting urination, 
 for 
        treatment of cough;
        chest tightness,
         lump 
        or tumor in abdomen; 
chest and abdomen pain,
coma; 
        stranguria



Chemical ingredients:
化學成份﹕【1】

        secretion of Physeter macrocephalu contains:

            8，13-環氧-14，15，16-三去甲半日花烷-13-醇

            8，13-環氧-12，-13-二去氫-14，15，16-三去甲半日花烷


           
    :
          

coprosterol

            糞甾醇


epicoprosterol

            表糞甾醇


cholesterol

            膽甾醇



            calcium and magnesium, phosphorus, copper, gallium, zinc, aluminum, 
            manganese, strontium, niobium, chromium, lanthanum, nickel, 
            titanium, tungsten

            鈣鎂、磷、銅、鎵、鋅、鋁、錳、鍶、鈮、鉻、鑭、鎳、鈦、鎢等。
 






Daly Dosage:
每日用量﹕

0.3 g ~ 1 g in powder form.研末，內服：0.3 
        克～1克。

Name: guan zhong
貫眾
Other: dong bei guan zhong 東北貫眾 (馬鱗毛蕨)

Maladies Treated: massive or incessant extramenstrual vaginal bleeding (treated using charcoal of guan zhong)
encephalitis B and other warm diseases
Medical Function: contraction of smooth muscle of the uterus
Samples of Formulae: He Yi et al used Huang Lan Pills (huang qi (astragalus root), guan zhong (dryopteris root), ban lan gen (isatis root), 30 g each) to treat 21 cases of CMV-IgM positive women. In one treatment cycle, 89.47% became negative.
Contraindications: Not to use during pregnancies or in patients with recent history of ulcers.
Research: He Yi et al used Huang Lan Pills (comprising huang qi (astragalus root), guan zhong (dryopteris root), ban lan gen (isatis root), 30 g each) to treat 21 cases of CMV-IgM positive women. After one treatment cycle, the conversion rate to negative was 89.47%.
Chemical Ingredients: selenium (root contains higher levels, root hairs contain lower levels)
References: [1] 王夔，徐辉碧，唐任寰，等. 生命科学中的微量元素［M］. 北京：中国计量出版社，1992：354-381.
化学成份来源：荚果蕨贯众化学成分研究Ⅲ，中医中药 >> 中国中药杂志 >> 2008年33卷14期 >> 摘要，张东 杨岚 傅梅红 屠呦呦，中国中医科学院中药研究所，北京100700

Todaro (莢果蕨)Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕kanjuPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕kwanjungPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕gun3 zung3Other Names:別名 ﹕dong bei guan zhong 東 北 貫眾  (馬鱗毛蕨), bian he 萹荷、guan jie 貫節、guan zhong 貫忡 、guan qu 貫 渠、hu juan 虎卷。Common Name:英文名﹕dryopteris root, shield-fern, Japanese flowering fern rhizome， male fern rhizome， Cyrtomium rhizome， matteuccia fern rhizome， Japonica China fern rhizome， Oriental blechnum fern rhizomeDistribution:產地﹕Heilongjiang, Jilin, Liaoning (Dryopteris), Hunan, Yunnan, Guizhou (Woodwardia), Henan, Gansu, Shandong, Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Sichuan (Osmunda), hebei, Henan, Shaanxi, and northeast China (Matteuccia)黑 龍 江。  吉 林 ﹐  遼 寧 (馬鱗毛蕨)﹐ 湖 南 ﹐ 云 南 ﹐ 貴 州 (頂芽狗脊蕨)﹐ 河 南 ﹐ ﹐ 甘 肅 山 東 ﹐ ﹐ 江 蘇 浙 江 ﹐ 四 川  (紫萁 )﹐  河 北 ﹐  河 南﹐  陝 西 ﹐ 東 北 (莢果蕨)。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕bitter, slightly cold, slightly toxic.苦，微寒；有 小毒。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕liver, spleen, stomach.肝﹐ 脾 ﹐ 胃Medical functions:藥理﹕ It is antibacterial, antiviral, anthelmintic, contraction of smooth muscle of the uterus, stop bleeding, governance toxic heat, or food poisoning, treatment of epidemic cerebrospinal meningitis and encephalitis B and other warm disease, anti-tumor, anti-early pregnancy, abortion, anti-leukemiarole and possesess estrogen-like effects  [1]具有抑菌、抗 病毒、驅虫，收縮子宮平滑肌，止血，治熱 毒或食毒，治流腦和乙腦等溫熱病、抗腫瘤、抗早孕、墮胎、雌激素樣作用及抗白血病等作用〔1〕Actions & Indications:主治﹕For: abdominal pain due to parasites, boils, charcoal of guan zhong being use in arrest bleeding and for massive or incessant extramenstral vaginal bleeding.hepatitis B用於虫積腹 痛瘡 瘍貫 仲炭止血，用于崩漏乙 型肝炎Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕作為入藥部位的貫眾根中含有較多的硒，而不作為入藥部 位的貫眾鬚中含硒較少.[2]demethoxymatteucinol去甲氧基荚果蕨素matteucinol荚果蕨素pinosylvin銀松素matteuorien荚果蕨黄素pinosylvin 3-O-β-D-glucopyranoside銀松素-3-O-β-D-葡萄糖苷matteuorienate A荚果蕨苷Aselenium硒flavaspidicacid黄绵馬酸Dosage:用量﹕4.5 to 9 g4.5 ~ 9 克 。Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕He yi et el used Huang Lan Pills (huang qi, guan zhong, ban lan gen 30 g each) treated 21 cases of CMV-IgM positive women. In one treatment cycle, 89.47% became negative.賀漪等［2］採用黃藍顆粒（黃耆、貫眾、板藍根各30克）治療21例CMV-IgM陽性的婦女，1個療程轉陰率為89.47﹪。Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕not to use during pregnancies or in patients with recent history of ulcers.曾近有胃潰瘍 者或懷孕期間忌用。　參考：http://www.tcmlib.com/zy/html47/showdetail-343631322ce79fb3e586b3e6988e2c7a79.html#TITLEe587bae5a484[1] 王夔，徐辉碧，唐任寰，等.生命科学中的微量元 素［M］.北 京：中国计量出版社，1992：354-381.[2] 湖北中医杂志，2001，23（2）：27.[2] http://journal.shouxi.net/html/qikan/yyglyyfyxwsx/zgggws/20081241/jyjs/20080831015837175_397028.html A manuscript... writing, translating and proofreading  in progress Click here for inquiry  Copyright Notice 按此看關於 版權問題List of Health ProblemsChinese Herb DictionaryToxicity of Some Herbs Side Effect of Some Herbs Herbs that can be toxic to kidneysTraditional Chinese MedicineTCM DiagnosisSamples of FormulaeAcupuncturecopy right 版權所有Qigong (chi kung)Prescribed Drug DictionaryEmail our web master for  your suggestion (not for inquiry)Biochemistry DictionaryGeneral Online LibraryQigong classesLecture SlidesResearch LibrarianSearchQigong classeshomeWeather Report DisclaimerLast update: April 24, 2012, 9:16 a.m. LAH化学成份来源：荚果蕨贯众化学成分研究Ⅲ，中 医中药 >> 中国中 药杂志 >> 2008年33卷14期 >> 摘要，张 东 杨岚 傅梅红 屠呦呦 ，中 国中医科学院中药研究所,北京100700Search this site

Name: tao jiao
Biological: Amygdalus davidiana (Carr.) C.de Vos ex Henry
Other: tao hua lei (tears of peach flower)

Maladies Treated: Urinary tract calculus (stones in urinary tract)

Blood in urine (血淋: short, astringent urine, painful dribbling, sensation of incomplete urination, pain and urgency in lower abdomen, possibly radiating to lumbar or abdominal region. Red-colored urine possibly with blood clots or severe cases urinating pure blood. In clinical practice, blood in urine accompanied with painful dribbling urination is categorized as 血淋. Chronic pyelonephritis, urethral syndrome, bladder cancer presenting bladder irritation symptoms with hematuria all belong to 'blood lin' category.)
Medical Function: Used for calculus in urinary tract, blood in urine, dysentery, chyluria
Dosage: For treating diabetes: 30 to 60 grams each time orally. For treating pain caused by stone in urinary tract: Use tao jiao the size of a da zao (Chinese date), mixed with 300 cc of drinking water, 3 times a day. (Use cool drinking water in summer and warm drinking water in winter.)
Samples of Formulae: For treatment of pain caused by stone in urinary tract: Use tao jiao the size of a da zao (Chinese date), mixed with 300 cc of drinking water. Take 3 times a day. Use cool drinking water in summer and warm drinking water in winter. For treatment of diabetes: Wash tao jiao with lukewarm water, cook in a small pot, and add any flavoring except sugar. Take orally 30 to 60 grams each time.
Notes: Gum arabic is commercially incorrectly sold as tao jiao or tao an zhu (beads shape), or tao jiao powder (powder form). It is not a pure chemical compound, and therefore, lacks a chemical formula. Secretions from trunks of peach, plum, apricot, and cherry trees are referred to as tao jiao (peach resin).
References: [1] Effective formulae from Ancient Time to Today 《古今錄驗方》
[2] Effective Herbal Formule Communication Set 《草藥驗方交流集》

Batsch.]Amygdalus davidiana (Carr.)C.de Vos ex Henry [Persica davidiana Carr.;Prunus davidiana (Carr.) Franch.]Pron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕tokyoPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕dogyoPron. in Cantonese:粵音﹕tou4 gaau1Other Names:別名﹕tao hua lei (tears of peach flower) 桃花淚Common Name:英文名﹕peach resinDistribution:產地﹕Hebei, Shanxi, Shaanxi, Gansu, Shandong, Henan, Sichuan, Yunnan provinces of China.河北，山西，陝西，甘肅，山東，河南，四川，雲南等地。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕Sweet, bitter, neutral.甘，苦，平。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕large intestine, bladder.大腸，膀胱。Medical functions:藥理﹕  Actions & Indications:主治﹕Being used in calculus in urinary tract, blood in urine, dysentery, chyluria.用於治：石淋，血淋，痢疾，乳糜尿。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ galactose半乳糖rhamnose鼠李糖a-glucuronic acidα-葡萄糖醛酸  Daly Dosage:每日用量﹕ Samples of formulae:處方舉例﹕For treatment of pain caused by stone in urinary tract:Use tao jiao the size of dai zao and mix with 300 cc of drinking water. Take 3 times a day. (Use cool drinking water in summer and warm drinking water in winter.)[1]For treatment of diabetes: wash tao jiao with luke warm water. Cook in a small pot. Add any flavoring if desire but do not add sugar. Take orally 30 to 60 grams each time. [2]治石淋作痛：桃木膠如棗大，夏以冷水三合，冬以湯三合和服，日三服，當下石，石盡即止。(《古今錄驗方》治糖尿病：桃膠，用微溫水洗凈，放在小鍋內煮食，隨便加些調味鹽類亦可(但不要加入甜味)。每次服一至二兩。(《草藥驗方交流集》)Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕[1] "Effective formulae from Ancient Time to Today" 《古今錄驗方》[2] Effective Herbal Formule Comunication Set 《草藥驗方交流集》Note: gum arabic are being sold as tao jiao or tao an zhu (beads shape) or tao jiao powder (in powder form) which is incorrect.Gum arabic is not a pure chemical compound. It does not have chemical formula.
The secretion of trunks of peach trees, plum  
trees, apricot  trees, cherry  trees are call tao jiao (peach resin). 註：阿拉伯樹膠簡稱阿拉伯膠，商業上誤稱做桃膠，桃胺珠(粒狀)或桃膠粉(粉狀)。 由於它不是一個純粹的化合物，故無分子式。桃，李，杏，櫻桃等樹幹分泌的膠稱為桃膠。 血淋：小便短澀.滴瀝刺痛，欲出未盡，小腹拘急，或痛引腰腹.小便紅赤，或夾有血塊，甚者可溺出純血，臨床上以尿血而兼小便滴瀝澀痛者，稱為血淋。慢性腎盂腎炎，尿道綜合徵，膀胱癌等病症表現有膀胱刺激症狀並伴有血尿者均屬"血淋" 範疇Search this siteProblems with website? Maladies Treated: damp heat, particularly in lower burner (xia jiao): vaginal bacterial infection, vaginal yeast infection, bacterial infection of bowel, infectious jaundice, wet and smelly groin area
hot leg qi causing swelling of knees, legs, feet
Medical Function: antibiotic: inhibits Staphylococcus aureus, pneumococcus, Shigella dysenteriae
Samples of Formulae: zhi bai di huang wan, long dan xie gan tang, zhi xie tang (for diarrhea due to acute bacterial infection)
Contraindications: Do not use in cases of spleen deficiency, weak digestion, lack of appetite. Use caution when there is no real heat.

entered:歸經﹕ 腎﹐膀胱經kidney﹐ bladderActions & Indications:功用﹕Rid of damp-heat , especially in the xia jiao (lower burner), as in vaginal bacterial infection or yeast infection, bacterial infection of the bowel,and infectious jaundice, wet and smelly groin area;For hot leg qi with swollen knees, legs and feet;spermatorrhea;night sweating﹔boils and sores﹔ 去 濕熱﹐  特別是下 焦 之感染﹐如﹕陰 道黴菌(帶下)或細 菌感染﹐大 腸之細 菌感染﹐細菌性黃疸﹐陰部潮 濕腥臭等﹔腳氣﹕腳﹐腿﹐膝部水腫﹔遺精﹔盜汗﹔瘡瘍腫毒﹔ Medical Function:藥理﹕(1) antibiotic: it can inhibit Staphylococcus aureaus, pnumococcus, Shigella dysenteriae(2) lower blood pressure(3) anti Trichomoniasis(4) lower blood sugar (1)抗菌，能直接抑制金黃色葡萄球菌﹐肺炎球菌﹐痢疾桿菌；(2)降血壓(3)抗陰道滴蟲；(4)降血糖。　Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕ 樹皮含 (bark contains)﹕小孽 鹼 (berberine),藥根鹼（jatrorrhizine),木蘭花碱(magnoflorine),黄柏鹼 (phellodendrine),n-甲基大麦芽碱(candicine),棕櫚鹼（palmatine）,蝠葛任鹼（menisperine）,. 黄 柏内酯(obaculactone),黃 蘗 酮（obacunone）,黃 蘗 酮酸 (obacunonic acid).白鲜交酯 (dictamnolide),青螢光酸 (lumicaeruliec acid)﹐7-脱氢豆甾醇(7-dehydrostigmasterol)﹐β-谷甾醇 (β-sitosterol)﹐菜油甾醇 (campesterol),青螢光酸 (lumicaeruleic acid),白鮮交酯(dictamnolide)。木材也含(wood contains:)小孽 鹼 (berberine)。 新鮮葉( leaves contian:)含黄柏甙 (phellamurin)﹐脱氢黄柏甙 (amurensin)﹐異黄柏甙 (phellavin)。 乾燥葉含(dried leaves contain:)金絲桃甙 (hyperosid)，不含黄 柏甙 (do not contain phellamurin)。Dosage:每日用量﹕3 to 12 gSamples of formulae:zhi bai di huang wan,long dan xie gan tang, zhi xie tang for diarrhea due to acute bacterial infectionModern Research:to be loaded.Cautions:Do not use in cases of spleen deficient, weak digestion, lack of appetite. Use caution when there is no real heat.胃弱食少 ﹐脾 虛泄瀉者忌服。無實熱者 慎用。Search this siteSearch this siteProblems with website? Please Click here for comment. Maladies Treated: pain in loin and knee joints
lack of strength in legs and knees
cirrhosis of liver resulting in ascites (preventive)
Samples of Formulae:
For treatment of spasm of gastrocnemius muscle (calf): Composition: mu gua, bai shao (white peony root), gan cao (licorice root). Make into decoction and use as tea. 

For treatment of muscular pain, muscle atrophy: Composition: zi jing pi 75 g (prepared by stir frying with rice wine), dang gui (Chinese angelica root) 18.75 g, chuan niu xi (Cyathula root) 11.25 g, qiang huo (Notopterygium root) 7.5 g, mu gua 11.25 g. Use 3 kilograms of good quality rice wine. Use double boiling method and cook for about one hour. Leave it overnight before using it as medicinal drinking wine. A remedy from 'Yunnan Materia Medica'.
Contraindications: Do not use in cases of cold or influenza. Excessive use may harm the teeth and bones.
Research: Seven compounds were isolated and identified: oleanolic acid (1), betulinic acid (2), 3-O-acetyl pomolic acid (3), ethyl chlorogenate (4), protocatechuic acid (5), gallic acid (6), kojic acid (7). Compounds 4-7 (ethyl chlorogenate, protocatechuic acid, gallic acid, kojic acid) were isolated from the Chaenomeles genus for the first time.[1]
Notes: The herb mu gua is not the same as the commonly eaten fruit mu gua (papaya), which comes from Carica papaya. The book 'Bare Foot Doctor Manual' published by the U.S. government incorrectly lists mu gua as fruit of Carica papaya.
References: [1] Shenyang School of Pharmacology Journal, 2006, issue 12, vol 23.
Original Text: mu gua, Complementary and Alternative Healing University     現代中藥辭典Complementary and Alternative Healing University   中藥詞典    Chinese Herb Dictionary      Search this site     在本網站找資料 See more menu at the bottom of page  mu gua 木瓜  (in English and Chinese 中英文） by: Joe Hing Kwok ChuPharmaceutical name:英文藥名﹕Fructus ChaenomelisBotanical name:學名﹕Chaenomeles Speciosa (Sweet) NakaiCydonia sinensis ThouinPron. in Japanese:日語發音﹕mokkaPron. in Korean:韓語發音﹕mokkwaPron. in Cantonese::粵音﹕muk6 gwaa1Other Names:別名﹕chen mu gua 陳木瓜，xuan mu gua 宣木瓜，ben gua 本瓜，chuan mu gua 川木瓜。Common Name:英文名﹕fruit of flowering quinceDistribution:產地﹕Anhui, Hubei, Zhejiang, Sichuan.安徽，湖北，浙江， 四川。Properties(characteristics)﹕性味﹕sour, slightly warm酸，微温。Channels (meridians) entered: 歸經﹕liver, spleen.肝，脾。Medical functions:藥理﹕ regulated autonomous nervous systemanti-inflammatoryanti-rheumatismanti-diureticanalgesicrelieve spastic muscles effect 調節植物神經，抗炎，抗風濕，抗利尿，鎮痛，緩解肌肉痙攣等作 用Actions & Indications:主治﹕Being used for sciatica, restless leg syndrome, cervical spondylosis, bone spurs,  arthritis, pain in loin and knee joints, beriberi with edema,  lack of strength in legs and knees, rheumatoid arthritis, chronic eczema, acute hepatitis with jaundice, prevent cirrhosis of liver resulting in ascites, spasm of gastronomies muscle (calf), vascular headache, for lowering blood lipids and overweight用於治療坐骨神經痛，不寧腿綜合症，頸椎病，骨質增生，濕痺拘孿，腰膝關節炎疼痛，腳氣水腫，腰腿 腳膝無力，風濕，頑癬，急性黃膽性肝炎，防治肝硬變腹水，腓腸肌痙攣，血管神經性頭痛，降脂減肥。Chemical ingredients:化學成份﹕Seven compounds were isolated and the structures of these compounds were identified as oleanolic acid(1), betulinic acid(2), 3-O-acetyl pomolic acid(3), ethyl chlorogenate(4), protocatechuic acid(5), gallic acid(6), kojic acid(7), respectively. Conclusion Compounds 4-7 are isolated from the Chaenomeles genus for the first time.. [1]分別鑒定為齊敦果酸(oleanolic acid, 1)、白樺酸(betulinic acid, 2)、3-O-乙 酰坡模酸(3-O-acetyl pomolic acid, 3)、綠原酸乙酯(ethyl chlorogenate, 4)、原兒茶酸(protocatechuic acid, 5)、沒食子酸(gallic acid, 6)、麴酸 (kojic acid, 7)。　化合物4~7為木瓜屬中首次分離得到的化合物 。[1]Daly Dosage:每日用量﹕9 -15 gSamples of formulae:處方舉例﹕For treatment of spasm of gastrocnemius muscle (calf):Composition: mu gua, bai shao,  gan cao.Make into decoction and use as tea. For treatment of muscles pain, muscle atrophy:Composition:  zi jing pi 75 g (stir fry with rice wine), dang gui 18.75 g, chuan niu xi  11.25 g, qiang huo 7.5 g, mu gua 11.25 g Use 3 kilograms of good quality rice wine. Use double cook and cook for about an hour. Leave it overnight before using as drinking wine. (Source: Yunnan Materia Medica) 治筋骨疼痛，痰火 痿軟，濕氣流痰：處方：紫 荊皮 二兩(酒炒)，當 歸五錢，川 牛膝三錢，川羌活二錢，木瓜三錢。上好酒 五斤，重湯 （隔水燉）煎一炷香（大若一小時）為度，露一夜，去火毒用。(《滇南本草》) 治療腓腸肌痙攣: 木瓜， 白芍 ， 甘 草。水煎服。Modern Research:現代研究﹕ Toxicity & Cautions:毒素與禁忌﹕Do not use in cases of cold or influenza. Excessive use may harm the teeth and bones.外感風寒者忌用。長期過度服用宣木瓜可能對牙齒與骨骼有害。 Note: the herb "mu gua" is not the same as mu gua eaten as fruit, which is the fruit of the plant Carica papaya.There is a book, Bare Foot Doctor Manual, publish by U.S. government, lists mu gua as fruit of Carica papaya. It is incorrect.註：藥用的木瓜也叫做宣木瓜，與當水果吃的木瓜不同。水果木瓜是Carica papaya 樹的果實，也叫做番木瓜。有一本美國政府出版的赤腳醫生手冊，把中藥木瓜當作水果木瓜。那是錯誤的。 [1]Shenyang School of Pharmacology Journal, 2006, issue 12, vol 23.    瀋陽藥科大學學報>23卷12期Search this siteProblems with website?
